00056 #define orxSTRUCTURE_GET_POINTER(STRUCTURE, TYPE) ((orx##TYPE *)_orxStructure_GetPointer(STRUCTURE, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_##TYPE))
00057 
00058 #define orxSTRUCTURE(STRUCTURE)     (((STRUCTURE != orxNULL) && ((((orxSTRUCTURE *)STRUCTURE)->eID ^ orxSTRUCTURE_MAGIC_TAG_ACTIVE) < orxSTRUCTURE_ID_NUMBER)) ? (orxSTRUCTURE *)STRUCTURE : (orxSTRUCTURE *)orxNULL)
00059

00061 #define orxANIMPOINTER(STRUCTURE)   orxSTRUCTURE_GET_POINTER(STRUCTURE, ANIMPOINTER)
00062 #define orxANIMSET(STRUCTURE)       orxSTRUCTURE_GET_POINTER(STRUCTURE, ANIMSET)

00065 #define orxCLOCK(STRUCTURE)         orxSTRUCTURE_GET_POINTER(STRUCTURE, CLOCK)

00067 #define orxFRAME(STRUCTURE)         orxSTRUCTURE_GET_POINTER(STRUCTURE, FRAME)

00069 #define orxFXPOINTER(STRUCTURE)     orxSTRUCTURE_GET_POINTER(STRUCTURE, FXPOINTER)

00083 #define orxSTRUCTURE_REGISTER(TYPE, STORAGE_TYPE, MEMORY_TYPE, UPDATE_FUNCTION) \
00084   orxStructure_Register(orxSTRUCTURE_ID_##TYPE, STORAGE_TYPE, MEMORY_TYPE, sizeof(orx##TYPE), UPDATE_FUNCTION)
00085 
00088 #define orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(STRUCTURE)                          \
00089   orxASSERT((STRUCTURE) != orxNULL);                            \
00090   orxASSERT((((orxSTRUCTURE *)(STRUCTURE))->eID ^ orxSTRUCTURE_MAGIC_TAG_ACTIVE) < orxSTRUCTURE_ID_NUMBER);
00091 
00094 #ifdef __orxDEBUG__
00095   #define orxSTRUCTURE_MAGIC_TAG_ACTIVE   0xDEFACED0
00096 #else
00097   #define orxSTRUCTURE_MAGIC_TAG_ACTIVE   0x00000000
00098 #endif
00099 
00100 #define orxSTRUCTURE_MAGIC_TAG_DELETED    0xDEADC0DE

00105 typedef enum __orxSTRUCTURE_ID_t
00106 {
00107   /* *** Following structures can be linked to objects *** */
00108 
00109   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_ANIMPOINTER = 0,
00110   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_BODY,
00111   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_CLOCK,
00112   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FRAME,
00113   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FXPOINTER,
00114   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_GRAPHIC,
00115   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SHADERPOINTER,
00116   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SOUNDPOINTER,
00117   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SPAWNER,
00118 
00119   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_LINKABLE_NUMBER,
00120 
00121   /* *** Below this point, structures can not be linked to objects *** */
00122 
00123   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_ANIM = orxSTRUCTURE_ID_LINKABLE_NUMBER,
00124   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_ANIMSET,
00125   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_CAMERA,
00126   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FONT,
00127   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FX,
00128   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_OBJECT,
00129   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SHADER,
00130   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SOUND,
00131   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_TEXT,
00132   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_TEXTURE,
00133   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_VIEWPORT,
00134 
00135   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_NUMBER,
00136 
00137   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_NONE = orxENUM_NONE
00138 
00139 } orxSTRUCTURE_ID;

00157 {
00158   orxSTRUCTURE_ID eID;            
00159   orxU32          u32Flags;       
00160   orxHANDLE       hStorageNode;   
00161   orxU32          u32RefCounter;  
00163 #ifdef __orxX86_64__
00164 
00165   orxU8           au8Padding[12]; 
00167 #endif /* __orxX86_64__ */
00168 
00169 } orxSTRUCTURE;

00182 static orxINLINE orxSTRUCTURE *_orxStructure_GetPointer(const void *_pStructure, orxSTRUCTURE_ID _eStructureID)
00183 {
00184   orxSTRUCTURE *pstResult;
00185 
00186   /* Updates result */
00187   pstResult = ((_pStructure != orxNULL) && (((orxSTRUCTURE *)_pStructure)->eID ^ orxSTRUCTURE_MAGIC_TAG_ACTIVE) == _eStructureID) ? (orxSTRUCTURE *)_pStructure : (orxSTRUCTURE *)orxNULL;
00188 
00189   /* Done! */
00190   return pstResult;
00191 }

00318 static orxINLINE void                                   orxStructure_IncreaseCounter(void *_pStructure)
00319 {
00320   /* Checks */
00321   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00322 
00323   /* Increases it */
00324   (orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure))->u32RefCounter++;
00325 
00326   return;
00327 }
00328 
00332 static orxINLINE void                                   orxStructure_DecreaseCounter(void *_pStructure)
00333 {
00334   /* Checks */
00335   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00336   orxASSERT(orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u32RefCounter > 0);
00337 
00338   /* Decreases it */
00339   orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u32RefCounter--;
00340 
00341   return;
00342 }
00343 
00348 static orxINLINE orxS32                                 orxStructure_GetRefCounter(const void *_pStructure)
00349 {
00350   /* Checks */
00351   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00352 
00353   /* Returns it */
00354   return(orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u32RefCounter);
00355 }
00356 
00361 static orxINLINE orxSTRUCTURE_ID                        orxStructure_GetID(const void *_pStructure)
00362 {
00363   /* Checks */
00364   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00365 
00366   /* Returns it */
00367   return((orxSTRUCTURE_ID)(orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->eID ^ orxSTRUCTURE_MAGIC_TAG_ACTIVE));
00368 }
00369 
00375 static orxINLINE orxBOOL                                orxStructure_TestFlags(const void *_pStructure, orxU32 _u32Flags)
00376 {
00377   /* Checks */
00378   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00379 
00380   /* Done! */
00381   return(orxFLAG_TEST(orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u32Flags, _u32Flags));
00382 }
00383 
00389 static orxINLINE orxBOOL                                orxStructure_TestAllFlags(const void *_pStructure, orxU32 _u32Flags)
00390 {
00391   /* Checks */
00392   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00393 
00394   /* Done! */
00395   return(orxFLAG_TEST_ALL(orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u32Flags, _u32Flags));
00396 }
00397 
00403 static orxINLINE orxU32                                 orxStructure_GetFlags(const void *_pStructure, orxU32 _u32Mask)
00404 {
00405   /* Checks */
00406   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00407 
00408   /* Done! */
00409   return(orxFLAG_GET(orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u32Flags, _u32Mask));
00410 }

00417 static orxINLINE void                                   orxStructure_SetFlags(void *_pStructure, orxU32 _u32AddFlags, orxU32 _u32RemoveFlags)
00418 {
00419   /* Checks */
00420   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00421 
00422   orxFLAG_SET(orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u32Flags, _u32AddFlags, _u32RemoveFlags);
00423 
00424   return;
00425 }
